LLMs.txt

Person
- Name: Maarten Casteels
- Role: Personal blog author and site owner

Site
- Name: Maarten's Blog
- Canonical URL: https://casteels.dev/
- Language: nl-BE (Dutch)

Summary
A Dutch personal blog with practical tutorials, opinions, and reflections on home automation, Java, and agile software development.

Main Topics
- Home automation (domotica, Home Assistant)
- Java and software engineering
- Agile practices and team collaboration
- Tooling and productivity for developers
